data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Willyan for Gwangju is whistled offside.
In the minute 4, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Gwangju.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Seongnam push forward at Tancheon Sports Complex and Kim Hyeon-seong gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gwangju defence.
In the minute 10, Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Free kick in a good position for Gwangju!
At Tancheon Sports Complex, Park Su-il has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 12, Gwangju attack but Felipe Silva's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
Felipe Silva scores to make it 0-1 at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 14, In Seongnam, Felipe Silva of Gwangju is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gwangju push upfield and Felipe Silva gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Seongnam defence.
Seongnam drives forward and Park Tae-jun gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 16, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gwangju at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 25, Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 28, Nam Il Kim is making the team's first substitution at Tancheon Sports Complex with Yun Yong-Ho replacing Jamshid Iskanderov.
Seongnam's Na Sangho misses with an attempt on goal.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Free kick Gwangju.
Gwangju drive forward but Willyan is judged offside.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam.
In the minute 32, Important block from the Seongnam defence as Felipe Silva fires in a strike for Gwangju.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
In the minute 36, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Gwangju throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Gwangju are pushing forward but Lee Min-ki's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 37, Gwangju to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam's Park Su-il gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gwangju defender.
In the minute 39, Kim Dong-hyeon (Seongnam) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Gwangju.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
In the minute 43, Seongnam are in shooting range from this free kick.
Gwangju are coming forward and Willyan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
In the minute 45, Jong Hyeok Kim will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seongnam throw-in in Gwangju's half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Throw-in high up the field for Gwangju in Seongnam.
Kim Hyeon-seong gets his shot on target but fails to score for Seongnam.
In the minute 48, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Gwangju.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a throw-in for Seongnam, close to Gwangju's area.
Seongnam have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 52, Park Tae-jun for Seongnam drives towards goal at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 54, Gwangju to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
The home team have replaced Park Su-il with Yang Dong-hyeon. This is the second substitution made today by Nam Il Kim.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Seongnam.
In the minute 56, Seongnam have a goal kick.
In Seongnam, Kim Hyeon-seong (Seongnam) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Important block from the Seongnam defence as Willyan fires in a strike for Gwangju.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seongnam.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam's Na Sangho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gwangju defender.
In the minute 62, Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seongnam throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 63, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Gwangju are caught offside.
In Seongnam Gwangju drive forward through Felipe Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 68, In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Park Jin Seob (Gwangju) is making a first substitution, with Du Hyeon-seok replacing Eom Won-sang.
Seongnam's Yang Dong-hyeon gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Gwangju.
Yeo Bong-hun is replacing Lee Eu-ddeum for Gwangju at Tancheon Sports Complex.
The home team have replaced Kim Dong-hyeon with Hong Si-hoo. This is the third substitution made today by Nam Il Kim.
In the minute 72, Seongnam pushes forward through Yang Dong-hyeon, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal! Du Hyeon-seok extends Gwangju's lead to 0-2.
Willyan instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 76, In Seongnam Gwangju attack through Willyan. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
In the minute 79, Seongnam's Hong Si-hoo breaks free at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
Seongnam's Na Sangho gets in a shot on goal at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Free kick Seongnam.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gwangju's Willyan gets in a shot on goal at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Yang Dong-hyeon (Seongnam) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 84, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Na Sangho for Seongnam gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seongnam.
In the minute 86, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Kim Ju-kong is replacing Willyan for the away team.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
Kim Hyeon-seong (Seongnam) strikes at Tancheon Sports Complex but his header is cleared.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Seongnam push forward at Tancheon Sports Complex and Kim Hyeon-seong gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gwangju defence.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Seongnam's Yang Dong-hyeon is on target but unsuccessful.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
